oai_dc:dc.dc:title: TIDAL WAVES IN SCHEMATIC ESTUARIES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vollmers, Hans
Sunderman, Jurgen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: tidal wave
schematic estuary
estuary
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An investigation of tidal waves in schematic estuaries has been carried out simultaneously for hydraulic and hydrodynamic- numerical (HN) models Thereby a far-reaching agreement of results is obtained for geometrically simple shapes. In these cases hydraulic investigations can be replaced equivalently by HN-computations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 12 (1970): Proceedings of 12th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Washington, D.C., 1970.; 129
